title: Day 5: God Will Give You Good Things
description: Psalm 4:6–8, Genesis 11:1–9, Matthew 5:3–12.  you have made us for yourself and our hearts are restless until they find their rest in you ’ God is the source of *all good things*
itunes:title: Day 5: God Will Give You Good Things
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 4:6–8, Genesis 11:1–9, Matthew 5:3–12.  you have made us for yourself and our hearts are restless until they find their rest in you ’ God is the source of *all good things*
itunes:summary:
We all seek happiness. We are all searching for love. We are all desperate for peace. But so often, we look in the wrong places.
St Augustine prayed, ‘Lord... you have made us for yourself and our hearts are restless until they find their rest in you.’ God is the source of all good things.
itunes:author: Nicky and Pippa Gumbel
